QuestData.Title: The Amphitheater of Anguish: Korrak the Bloodrager!
QuestData.Description: You're not gonna believe this, pal. Your next fight is against Korrak the Bloodrager! Looks like the Drakkari trolls are pulling a power play! And let me tell you, buddy, he's been sippin' the animal god juice. He's good and ready to pound you into the ground.$B$BAre you ready?
QuestData.LogDescription: Get in the arena at the Amphitheater of Anguish and defeat Korrak the Bloodrager! Return to Wodin the Troll-Servant to redeem your reward.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Wodin the Troll-Servant at Amphitheater of Anguish in Zul'Drak.
QuestData.CompletionText: No payout until the fight's over, $g man:lady;.
QuestData.RewardText: Damn, I remember Korrak from way back in my younger days when I used to work for the Frostwolf Clan. He would never shut up! I think you just did the world a great service, $n.
